profileUrl.title: Profile URL or Username
profileUrl.description: LinkedIn profile URL (e.g. https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella) or just the username

postUrl.title: Single Post URL
postUrl.description: Single LinkedIn post URL to fetch

postUrls.title: Post URLs (Batch)
postUrls.description: Array of LinkedIn post URLs to fetch in batch

count.title: Number of Posts
count.description: Number of posts to fetch from a profile

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Backend API key (optional, uses default if not provided)

li_at.title: LinkedIn li_at Cookie
li_at.description: Your LinkedIn li_at session cookie (required). Get from DevTools → Application → Cookies → linkedin.com → li_at

jsessionid.title: LinkedIn JSESSIONID
jsessionid.description: Your LinkedIn JSESSIONID cookie (optional but recommended)

email.title: LinkedIn Email
email.description: Email for login (alternative to li_at cookie)

otp.title: OTP Verification Code
otp.description: Email verification code from LinkedIn (if challenge triggered)
